RaiderIOApiConnector module

class RaiderIOApiConnector.RaiderIOApiConnector[source]

Bases: ApiClient

Request(url: str, query: dict)[source]

This function sends the request to raider.io API

Parameters:

  • url – Full URL of the request

  • query – What we want to request from RaiderIO

Returns:

response in the json form

RequestAffix(region: str, locale: str)[source]

This function will get us the weekly affix information from the raider.io API

Parameters:

  • region – the region whose affixes you want from

  • locale – the language in which you want them returned for full list https://raider.io/api

Returns:

a JSON from raiderIO

RequestCharacter(region: str, realm: str, character: str, field: str = None)[source]

This function will get us the character information from the raider.io API

Parameters:

  • region – the region the character is from

  • realm – the realm the character is from

  • character – the character’s name

  • field – here you add extra attributes you can request from raider.io about a character. If you want to add

multiple extra fields you need to seperate them using a comma, for example ‘gear,talents,mythic_plus_ranks’ See https://raider.io/api for the full list of available fields :return: a JSON from raiderIO

RequestMythicRun(season, run_id)[source]

This function will get us the requested run information from the raider.io API

Parameters:

  • season – name of the season to retrieve (season-df-1, etc.). Defaults to current season.

  • run_id – the link to the run

Returns:

a JSON from raiderIO

base_url = 'https://raider.io'
